MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG12 postcode area of Annan. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:45pm due to an underground cable fault on McNeish Drive. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:10pm on Friday , 26 March 2021
